description: Manage files and folders with ease. Read and write files, list directories, create folders, and delete unwanted items to keep projects organized.

capabilities.name: read_file
capabilities.description:
Read contents of a file.
        
        Args:
            path: Path to the file to read

capabilities.name: write_file
capabilities.description:
Write content to a file.
        
        Args:
            path: Path to the file to write
            content: Content to write to the file

capabilities.name: list_directory
capabilities.description:
List contents of a directory.
        
        Args:
            path: Path to the directory (defaults to current directory)

capabilities.name: create_directory
capabilities.description:
Create a new directory.
        
        Args:
            path: Path to the directory to create

capabilities.name: delete_file
capabilities.description:
Delete a file.
        
        Args:
            path: Path to the file to delete
